THE MANIFESTO

Why I'm not your typical bookkeeper

01

I'M AN ARTIST TOO

Started as a painter. Got tired of eating ramen. Learned bookkeeping. Now I eat sushi AND help artists do the same.

02

YOUR MESS IS MY MUSE

Shoebox full of receipts? Bank statements covered in paint? Three years of "I'll do it tomorrow"? That's not chaos. That's Tuesday for me.

03

NO CORPORATE BULLSH*T

I won't make you wear a suit. I won't judge your "creative accounting." I will make sure you're legal, profitable, and can afford better paint.

04

I SPEAK YOUR LANGUAGE

Commission? Grant? Gallery cut? Barter deal? I know the difference and how to track it all. Your CPA will think you hired a Fortune 500 accountant.

05

DEDUCTIONS ARE MY DRUG

That vintage frame? Write-off. Studio playlist subscription? Deductible. Trip to MoMA? Research, baby. I find money where other bookkeepers see receipts.

06

YOUR SUCCESS = MY ART

When you can afford a bigger studio, better supplies, or that residency in Iceland - that's my masterpiece. Your financial freedom is my gallery opening.
